thread.title: Georgina Wolton
thread.title_full: Chocolate Trading Company reviewed by Georgina Wolton

author: Georgina Wolton
title: Georgina Wolton
text:
I will continue to buy this drinking chocolate as long as I can.
My one reservation is the tin lids which are a devil to remove and replace but I know this is churlish in such a superior product. So forgive.
Happy Client.
